casebody.data:
Witten, Appellee, v. City of Richmond Heights et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Witten v. Richmond Hts. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 204.]

(No. 00-917 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.)

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. *205Lester S. Potash, for appellee. R. Todd Hunt, Director of Law; Walter & Haverfield, P.L.L., Jonathan D. Greenberg and Barbara R. Marburger, for appellants.
